lead_paragraph: The Department of Commerce recently estimated Germany's current national income to be 100,000,000,000 marks annually. Now come estimates from Germany, based on figures of the Reich's Assistant Minister of Finance, Fritz Reinhardt, which place the total of the Reich's military expenditures in the first two years of the war at that same figure, 100,000,000,000 marks.
